name: No Skill
can_be_applied_to: Small Shields, Medium Shields, Greatshields, Torches
Equipment: Can be used on Shields and Torches.
description: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead. Usable on shields and torches

name: Lion's Claw
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Hammers (small armaments and Thrusting Swords excepted).
description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside the General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament

name: Impaling Thrust
Equipment: Can be used on armaments capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a long thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.

name: Piercing Fang
Equipment: Can be used on medium and large armaments capable of thrusting.
description: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.

name: Spinning Slash
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Polearms (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Charge Forth
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms capable of thrusting, Heavy Thrusting Swords, and Twinblades.
description: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance

name: Stamp (Upward Cut)
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Hammers, (small and medium swords excepted).
description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

name: Stamp (Sweep)
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Hammers (small and medium swords excepted).
description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

name: Blood Tax
Equipment: Can be used on armaments capable of thrusting (Colossal Weapons excepted).
description: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP

name: Repeating Thrust
Equipment: Can be used on all thrusting weapons. (Colossal Weapons excepted).
description: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.

name: Wild Strikes
Equipment: Can be used on Axes and Hammers as well as Curved Swords and Greatswords (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Swing armament with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

name: Spinning Strikes
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms (Great Spears excepted).
description: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

name: Double Slash
Equipment: Can be used on swords and polearms capable of slashing (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Prelate's Charge
Equipment: Can be used on large and colossal axes and hammers.
description: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge

name: Unsheathe
Equipment: Can be used on Katanas.
description: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

name: Square Off
Equipment: Can be used on Straight Swords.
description: Slash up through enemy guards with a normal attack, or run and thrust with a strong attack.

name: Giant Hunt
Equipment: Can be used on large and colossal weapons capable of thrusting, Spears and  Twinblades.
description: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

name: Torch Attack
Equipment: Can be used on all Torches.
description: Thrust your torch forward to set foes ablaze. This Skill is especially effective against foes who are weak to fire.

name: Loretta's Slash
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms and Twinblades.
description: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

name: Poison Moth Flight
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Swords (Twinblades excepted).
description: Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.

name: Spinning Weapon
Equipment: Small and medium Swords, Axes, Hammers, Polearms, Staves (great spears excepted)
description: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

name: Storm Assault
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and Twinblades.
description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

name: Stormcaller
Equipment: Can be used on Swords capable of slashing, Axes, Hammers, and polearms (small and colossal weapons excepted).
description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Sword Dance
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Polearms capable of slashing (colossal weapons and great spears excepted).
description: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

name: Spinning Chain
Equipment: Can be used on Flails.
description: Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successful attack.

name: Glintblade Phalanx
Equipment: Usable on Swords as well as Polearms capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted)
description: Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family. Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

name: Sacred Blade
Equipment: All melee armaments (Whips, Fists, and Claws excepted).
description: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.

name: Ice Spear
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms capable of thrusting and Twinblades.
description: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

name: Glintstone Pebble
Equipment: Can be used on Swords and Polearms capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.

name: Bloody Slash
Equipment: Can be used on Swords (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

name: Lifesteal Fist
Equipment: Can be used on Fists and Claws.
description: Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies. A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

name: Eruption
Equipment: Can be used on colossal Swords, Axes, and Hammers.
description: Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.

name: Prayerful Strike
Equipment: Can be used on Axes and Hammers.
description: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

name: Gravitas
Equipment: Melee armaments that are not small.
description: Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone. Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.

name: Storm Blade
Equipment: Can be used Swords (Colossal Weapons and Twinblades excepted)
description: Lost skill of Stormveil. Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Earthshaker
Equipment: Can be used Greataxes, Warhammers, and Colossal Weapons.
description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Golden Land
Equipment: Can be used on Greataxes, Warhammers, and Colossal Weapons.
description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Flaming Strike
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Colossal Weapons and Whips excepted).
description: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.

name: Thunderbolt
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult. Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Lightning Slash
Equipment: Can be used on Swords, Axes, and Hammers.
description: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.

name: Carian Grandeur
Equipment: Can be used on Swords (colossal weapons excepted).
description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into magical greatsword and swing ti down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.

name: Carian Greatsword
Equipment: Can be used on Swords (colossal weapons excepted)
description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.

name: Vacuum Slice
Equipment: Can be used on Swords and Axes (small and colossal axes excepted).
description: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearin vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

name: Black Flame Tornado
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms and Twinblades.
description: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

name: Sacred Ring of Light
Equipment: Usable on polearms (Great Spears excepted).
description: Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, and then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Firebreather
Equipment: Steel-Wire Torch
description: Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

name: Blood Blade
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Swords.
description: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Phantom Slash
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms and Twinblades (Great Spears excepted).
description: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Spectral Lance
Equipment: Can be used on Polearms (reapers excepted).
description: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

name: Chilling Mist
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Whips, Fists, and Claws excepted).
description: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.

name: Poisonous Mist
Equipment: Usable on certain melee armaments (Whips, Fists, and Claws excepted).
description: Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retain its poison for a while.

name: Shield Bash
Equipment: Can be used on all Shields.
description: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

name: Barricade Shield
Equipment: Can be used on all Shields.
description: Focus your energy into your shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows. It can be used on all types of shield.

name: Parry
Equipment: Can be used on Daggers, Curved Swords, Thrusting Swords, Fists, Claws, and small and medium Shields.
description: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.

name: Buckler Parry
Equipment: Buckler
description: Use this Skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.

name: Carian Retaliation
Equipment: Can be used on light and medium Shields
description: Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Storm Wall
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Shields
description: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Golden Parry
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Shields.
description: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.

name: Shield Crash
Equipment: Can be used on all Shields.
description: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.

name: Thops's Barrier
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Shields.
description: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Through and Through
Equipment: Can be used on Greatbows.
description: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

name: Barrage
Equipment: Can be used on Light Bows.
description: Archery Skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

name: Mighty Shot
Equipment: Can be used on Light Bows and Longbows.
description: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

name: Enchanted Shot
Equipment: Can be used on Light Bows and Longbows.
description: Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence. The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

name: Sky Shot
Equipment: Can be used Light Bows and Longbows.
description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from abose when it comes down.

name: Rain of Arrows
Equipment: Can be used on all Bows.
description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.

name: Hoarfrost Stomp
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.

name: Storm Stomp
Equipment: All melee armaments.
description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.

name: Kick
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Push an enemy back with a high kick.Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.

name: Lightning Ram
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

name: Flame of the Redmanes
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

name: Ground Slam
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

name: Golden Slam
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees. Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.

name: Waves of Darkness
Equipment: Can be used on Greataxes, Warhammers, and Colossal Weapons.
description: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: A skill where slamming both hands to the ground will unleash a shockwave, following up with another input will enable you to slam the ground again.

name: Determination
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

name: Royal Knight's Resolve
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

name: Assassin's Gambit
Equipment: Can be used on small and medium Straight Swords and Thrusting Swords.
description: Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.

name: Golden Vow
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

name: Sacred Order
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence . Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

name: Shared Order
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

name: Seppuku
Equipment: Can be used on Swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (small and colossal weapons excepted).
description: A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

name: Cragblade
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Whips excepted).
description: Skill that manipulates gravity. Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.

name: Barbaric Roar
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Daggers, Thrusting Swords, and Whips excepted).
description: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks.

name: War Cry
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Daggers, Thrusting Swords, and Whips excepted).
description: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power.While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

name: Beast's Roar
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-traveling projectile.

name: Troll's Roar
Equipment: Can be used on large and Colossal Swords, Axes, and Hammers.
description: Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes. Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.

name: Braggart's Roar
Equipment: Can be used on melee armaments (Daggers, Thrusting Swords, and Whips excepted).
description: Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense and stamina recover speed.

name: Endure
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

name: Vow of the Indomitable
Equipment: Can be used on all Shields.
description: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

name: Holy Ground
Equipment: Can be used on all Shields.
description: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it.

name: Quickstep
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot. Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

name: Bloodhound's Step
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

name: Raptor of the Mists
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments
description: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air

name: White Shadow's Lure
Equipment: Can be used on all melee armaments.
description: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state.

name: Surge of Faith
Equipment: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
description: Set the flames of Birac's faith ablaze in the cranial vessel, then raise it aloft to rain down fireballs in all directions. Repeated inputs will continue to raise the armament aloft, continuing the attack.

name: Flame Spit
Equipment: One-Eyed Shield
description: Ready the shield, then launch a fireball from the barrel. The fireball explodes on impact.

name: Tongues of Fire
Equipment: Visage Shield
description: Ready the shield, then spray violent jets of fire from the tongues protruding from its maw. Hold to continue spraying fire. This skill can be used while walking.

name: Oracular Bubble
Equipment: Envoy's Horn
description: Blow on the horn to release a magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

name: Bubble Shower
Equipment: Envoy's Long Horn
description: Blow on the horn to release a spume of magic bubbles. The bubbles float gently before raining down on the target.

name: Great Oracular Bubble Skill
Equipment: Envoy's Greathorn
description: Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

name: Sea of Magma
Equipment: Magma Whip Candlestick
description: Swing a molten whip overhead to temporarily cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma. Hold to continue swinging the lava whip.

name: Viper Bite
Equipment: Coil Shield
description: Give the shield a quick shake to temporarily bring the bronze viper to life, inciting it to lash out and bite foes.

name: Moonlight Greatsword
Equipment: Dark Moon Greatsword
description: Raise the sword aloft, bathing it in the light of the dark moon. Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with frost. Charged attacks release blasts of moonlight.

name: Siluria's Woe
Equipment: Siluria's Tree
description: Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind. Charged attacks have the power to blow away enemies and can fire the tornado forwards.

name: Rallying Standard
Equipment: Commander's Standard
description: Hoist the war banner aloft and give a rallying command. Raises attack power and defense for self and nearby allies.

name: Bear Witness!
Equipment: Grafted Dragon
description: Grant the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
Equipment: Marais Executioner's Sword, Regalia of Eochaid
description: Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning. Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

name: Soul Stifler
Equipment: Winged Greathorn
description: Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma. Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced defense.

name: Taker's Flames
Equipment: Blasphemous Blade
description: Raise the sacred sword aloft to set it ablaze with blasphemous flames, then bring it down to fire off a forward blast. The flames steal HP from those they touch.

name: Shriek of Milos
Equipment: Sword of Milos
description: Lets out a horrific cursed scream that reduces all damage negation and status resistances for nearby foes. While active, strong attacks will change to a combo attack.

name: Reduvia Blood Blade
Equipment: Reduvia dagger
description: Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloostains into airborne blood blades that cause hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Glintstone Dart
Equipment: Glintstone Kris
description: Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery. Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

name: Night-and-Flame Stance
Equipment: Sword of Night and Flame
description: Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery. Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.

name: Wave of Gold
Equipment: Sacred Relic Sword
description: Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes. A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.

name: Ruinous Ghostflame
Equipment: Helphen's Steeple
description: Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame. The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.

name: Establish Order
Equipment: Golden Order Greatsword
description: Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion. Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.

name: Mists of Slumber
Equipment: Sword of St Trina
description: Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area. This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Spearcall Ritual
Equipment: Death Ritual Spear
description: Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.

name: Wolf's Assault
Equipment: Royal Greatsword
description: Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.

name: Thundercloud Form
Equipment: Dragon King's Cragblade
description: Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade. Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.

name: Cursed-Blood Slice
Equipment: Morgott's Cursed Sword
description: Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice. The bloody trail of the late is followed by a burst of flame. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Waterfowl Dance
Equipment: Hand of Malenia
description: Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Gold Breaker
Equipment: Marika's Hammer
description: Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground. The heroic Radagon's signature attack.

name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
Equipment: Axe of Godrick
description: Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves. Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave

name: Regal Roar
Equipment: Axe of Godfrey
description: Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.

name: Starcaller Cry
Equipment: Starscourge Greatsword
description: Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave. Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.

name: Wave of Destruction
Equipment: Ruins Greatsword
description: Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.

name: Bloodboon Ritual
Equipment: Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear
description: Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust. This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

name: Flowing Form
Equipment: Nox Flowing Sword
description: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form. Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.

name: Blade of Death
Equipment: Black Knife
description: Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile. In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.

name: Blade of Gold
Equipment: Blade of Calling
description: Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile. Inflicts holy damage.

name: Destined Death
Equipment: Maliketh's Black Blade
description: Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades. In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.

name: Spinning Wheel
Equipment: Ghiza's Wheel
description: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.

name: Alabaster Lord's Pull
Equipment: Alabaster Lord's Sword
description: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in. Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.

name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
Equipment: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
description: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.

name: Oath of Vengeance
Equipment: Grafted Blade Greatsword
description: Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

name: Ice Lightning Sword
Equipment: Dragonscale Blade
description: Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe. The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.

name: Regal Beastclaw
Equipment: Beastclaw Greathammer
description: Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.

name: Flame Dance
Equipment: Giant's Red Braid
description: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

name: Claw Flick
Equipment: Ringed Finger
description: Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.

name: Nebula
Equipment: Bastard's Stars, Wing of Astel
description: Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike. This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.

name: Ghostflame Ignition
Equipment: Death's Poker
description: Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame. Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

name: Ancient Lightning Spear
Equipment: Bolt of Gransax
description: Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear. Can be charged to increase its power.

name: Frenzyflame Thrust
Equipment: Vyke's War Spear
description: Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion. The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.

name: Miquella's Ring of Light
Equipment: Halo Scythe
description: Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Golden Tempering
Equipment: Ornamental Straight Sword
description: Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence. While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.

name: Last Rites
Equipment: Golden Epitaph
description: Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourself and allies in the vicinity. Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.

name: Unblockable Blade
Equipment: Cipher Pata, Coded Sword
description: Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack. This attack cannot be blocked.

name: Corpse Wax Cutter
Equipment: Gargoyle's Blackblade
description: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

name: Zamor Ice Storm
Equipment: Zamor Curved Sword
description: Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.

name: Radahn's Rain
Equipment: Lion Greatbow
description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky. The arrows will pour on foes like rain.

name: The Queen's Black Flame
Equipment: Godslayer Greatsword
description: Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.

name: Dynast's Finesse
Equipment: Bloody Helice
description: Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes. Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.

name: Magma Shower
Equipment: Magma Blade
description: Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Death Flare
Equipment: Eclipse Shotel
description: Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes. Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.

name: Bloodhound's Finesse
Equipment: Bloodhound's Fang
description: Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes. Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

name: Magma Guillotine
Equipment: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
description: Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

name: Corpse Piler
Equipment: Rivers of Blood
description: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.

name: Transient Moonlight
Equipment: Moonveil
description: Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.

name: Bloodblade Dance
Equipment: Eleonora's Poleblade
description: Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks. Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.

name: Knowledge Above All
Equipment: Scepter of the All-Knowing
description: Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing. Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.

name: Devourer of Worlds
Equipment: Devourer's Scepter
description: Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.

name: Familial Rancor
Equipment: Family Heads
description: Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes. The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.

name: Rosus's Summons
Equipment: Rosus' Axe
description: Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death. Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.

name: Thunderstorm
Equipment: Stormhawk Axe
description: Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks. The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.

name: Sacred Phalanx
description: Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.

name: Great-Serpent Hunt
Equipment: Serpent-Hunter
description: Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input. When fightning a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.

name: Angel's Wings
Equipment: Winged Scythe
description: Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy. The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

name: Storm Kick
Equipment: Veteran's Prosthesis
description: Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.

name: Sorcery of the Crozier
Equipment: Watchdog's Staff
description: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.

name: Erdtree Slam
Equipment: Staff of the Avatar, Rotten Staff
description: Jump high up into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions. This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.

name: Gravity Bolt
Equipment: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
description: Imbue the jaw of fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away. Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Fires of Slumber
Equipment: St Trina's Torch
description: Blow into the candlestick's flame, creating a stream of hazy purple fire to cover the ground ahead. The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Golden Retaliation
Equipment: Erdtree Greatshield
description: Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation. This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

name: Contagious Fury
Equipment: Jellyfish Shield
description: Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you. Raises attack power for a certain duration.

name: Ordovis's Vortex
Equipment: Ordovis's Greatsword
description: Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground. This skill can be charged to increase its power.
